resources.string: গ্লুকোসিও হল ডায়াবেটিসে আক্রান্ত ব্যাক্তিদের একটি ইউজার কেন্দ্রীক ফ্রি ও ওপেনসোর্স অ্যাপ।

Using Glucosio, you can enter and track blood glucose levels, anonymously support diabetes research by contributing demographic and anonymized glucose trends, and get helpful tips through our assistant. Glucosio respects your privacy and you are always in control of your data.
* User Centered. Glucosio apps are built with features and a design that matches the user\'s needs and we are constantly open to feedback for improvement.
* Open Source. Glucosio apps give you the freedom to use, copy, study, and change the source code of any of our apps and even contribute to the Glucosio project.
* Manage Data. Glucosio allows you to track and manage your diabetes data from an intuitive, modern interface built with feedback from diabetics.
* Support Research. Glucosio apps give users the option to opt-in to sharing anonymized diabetes data and demographic info with researchers.
